content: 3rd and 4th stitch on the left needle as if to purl drop 4 sts off the left needle and pick up the 2 loose stitches from the back with the left needle transfer 2 stitches back from right needle to left needle k4 pattern before you start the cable pattern is stretchy but at the same time tends to draw the fabric in therefore you need more stitches in the round than for a stockinette sock as written the smaller size fits an adult s small/medium foot and the larger size fit s a medium/large if you want the socks to fit a really large foot use a sock yarn that is on the thicker side of fingering or a light sport weight and knit with a larger needle size cuff loosely cast on 69 82 sts and join to begin working in the round work 14 rounds of ribbing like this k2 p2 k2 p2 k3 p2 5 6 times k2 p2 leg setup work 1 round as follows k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 kfb p2 5 6 times k2 p2 now you have 74 88 sts on your needles leg start working the leg chart always work the repeat marked by the red delimiters 4 5 times per round work rounds 1-24 of leg pattern twice then work round 1 once more cuff plus leg will then be about 14cm 5 5 long if you prefer a longer leg work rounds 2-24 and than round 1 for a third time but be aware that you ll be needing more yarn ©caoua coffee 2017 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved florestan v 1 page 2/6 florestan socks - by caoua coffee leg chart set-up for heel flap smaller size only work the next 19 stitches as follows k2 p2 k2 p2tog p2tog k2 p2 k2 p2 k1 then put the next 38 sts on hold they will be worked later for instep turn your work ws sl yf k2 p2 twice k2 p2 k2 3times p2 k2tog k2tog p2 k2 p1 turn rs sl yb p2 k2 p2 7times k1 turn the heel is worked back and forth over the 32 sts you have still on the needles larger size only work the next 24 stitches as follows k2 p2 k2 p2tog p2tog k2 p2 k2 twice p2 k2tog then put the next 42 sts on hold they will be worked later for instep turn your work ws sl yf k2 p2 3times k2 p2 k2 3times p2 k2tog k2tog p2 k2 twice sl yf sl yf turn rs ssk p2 k2 p2 9times k1 turn the heel is worked back and forth over the 40 sts you have still on the needles continue for both sizes heel flap ws sl yf k2 sl yf sl yf 7 9 times k2 sl yf turn rs k1 p2 k2 p2 7 9 times k1 turn work theses 2 row 16 18 times i e 32
